author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Income Tax Department on Tuesday conducted searches on the properties of the Apollo group of hospitals across the country.

“It is a regular process. We cannot share any further information at this stage,” said a senior I-T official, adding that the exercise was being carried out to ascertain if there were any violations. Searches were also conducted at the residence of the Apollo Hospitals’ executive vice-chairperson.

In a statement the group said: “We extended our complete cooperation to the IT Department.”
title: I-T searches on Apollo premises
